about_the_game:
The RUNE II: Berserker Upgrade Pack includes in-game RECIPES for:

BERSERKER ARMOR

Fur fit for a Jarl

Don the Berserker armor and show your enemies you’re not afraid to wear their skulls as decoration.

BERSERKER HAMMER

Unleash Your Rage

Wield the Grand Berserker Hammer and bring the fury of Ragnarok down upon your foes. This wood and gold hammer, crafted from the rarest materials, is intended only for the strongest warriors of Midgard.. The Berserker Hammer’s raw power is enough to get the job done, and then some.

WARRIOR ARMOR SET

Rise, Warrior

The Berserker Rage pack is the only way to obtain the Warrior’s Blade and Warrior Armor set A dull blade is a warrior’s worst enemy, and the Warrior’s Blade is always sharp. Crafted from mythical dwarven metals, the Warrior Armor is capable of divine protection and is said to have been anointed by the gods themselves.

BERSERKER ARMOR

Wield the Grand Berserker Hammer and bring the fury of Ragnarok down upon your foes. This wood and gold hammer, crafted from the rarest materials, is intended only for the strongest warriors of Midgard.. The Berserker Hammer’s raw power is enough to get the job done, and then some.

WARRIOR ARMOR SET

Rise, Warrior

The Berserker Rage pack is the only way to obtain the Warrior’s Blade and Warrior Armor set A dull blade is a warrior’s worst enemy, and the Warrior’s Blade is always sharp. Crafted from mythical dwarven metals, the Warrior Armor is capable of divine protection and is said to have been anointed by the gods themselves.

name: RUNE II: Berserker Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1, & Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1, & Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD A-10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: Upgrade to the Berserker Pack and receive in-game RECIPES for the Berserker Armor set, Berserker Hammer, Game Soundtrack and Digital World Map!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
